text: The Lady Aoi is a play written by Yukio Mishima in 1954, which appears in his Five Modern Noh Plays. It modernizes the noh drama Aoi no Ue. == In English == Donald Keene has translated this play into English. == Notable productions == Bahram Beyzai produced this play in Persian in Tehran in 1998. == References == Category:Plays by Yukio Mishima Category:1954 plays
title: The Lady Aoi
